name: Yunheung Paek
content: professor - 서울대학교연구원 Professor Yunheung Paek Education and Professional Experience He earned a B.S. and an M.S. in Computer Engineering from Seoul National University. After he graduated from the Korea 3rd Military Academy, he joined the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign where he received a Ph.D. degree in Computer Science. Before joining SNU, he had been an associate professor in Electrical and Eletronics Department at KAIST and an assistant professor in Computer Science Department at NJIT, USA. Research Interest Computer system security, Internet of Things security, System on Chip Design, Compiler Design Contact 302 Engineering Education & Research Building Rm#631 Phone: 82-2-880-1748 E-mail: ypaek.[at].snu.ac.kr Homepage: http://sor.snu.ac.kr/document/ypaek Secretary (Jiseon Kim) 302 Engineering Education & Research Building Rm#516-3E-mail: sorlabsnu.[at].gmail.comPhone: 02-880-1741 Professor Byoungyoung Lee Education and Professional Experience He earned BS and MS in Computer Science and Engineering from POSTECH, and PhD in Computer Science from Georgia Tech. Before joining SNU, he was an Assistant Professor in Computer Science at Purdue University. Research Interest Software security, Systems security, Cyber Physical Systems (CPS) security Contact 301 Engineering Education & Research Building Rm#709 E-mail: byoungyoung.[at].snu.ac.kr Homepage: https://lifeasageek.github.io Secretary (Hyung Jin Kal) 302 Engineering Education & Research Building Rm#516-3E-mail: kelf83.[at].snu.ac.krPhone: 82-2-880-1741
